about_page.title: About Us
about_page.description: A blog platform focused on modern web development technologies, sharing the latest tech trends and development experiences.
about_page.project_intro_paragraph1: This is a modern blog platform built with Next.js, designed to provide a platform for developers to share technical articles and exchange development experiences.
about_page.project_intro_paragraph2: We focus on content sharing in areas such as frontend technology, backend development, and DevOps.
about_page.project_intro_paragraph3: The platform supports user registration, article publishing, comment interaction, and other features, adopting a responsive design to ensure a good user experience on various devices.
about_page.tech_stack_description: Main technologies and tools used in this project
about_page.feature_modern_tech_stack_description: Built with the latest web technologies to ensure optimal performance and user experience
about_page.feature_responsive_design_description: Perfectly adapts to various devices, from desktops to mobile phones
about_page.feature_seo_optimization_description: Optimized for search engines to make your content more discoverable
about_page.feature_secure_reliable_description: Adopts modern security practices to protect user data and privacy
about_page.contact_us_description: If you have any questions or suggestions, please feel free to contact us

privacy_policy_page.title: Privacy Policy
privacy_policy_page.section1_paragraph1: We may collect personal information you provide to us when using this blog platform, such as your name, email address, username, and password. In addition, we automatically collect certain non-personal information, including your IP address, browser type, operating system, access time, and the pages you visit.
privacy_policy_page.section1_paragraph2: For article access, we record article ID, user ID (if logged in), IP address, and User-Agent for the purpose of counting article views and analyzing user behavior.
privacy_policy_page.section2_paragraph1: We use the information collected to:
privacy_policy_page.section2_list_item1: Provide, operate, and maintain our blog platform;
privacy_policy_page.section2_list_item2: Improve, personalize, and expand our blog platform;
privacy_policy_page.section2_list_item3: Understand and analyze how you use our blog platform;
privacy_policy_page.section2_list_item4: Develop new products, services, features, and functionality;
privacy_policy_page.section2_list_item5: Communicate with you, including customer service, providing updates, and other information;
privacy_policy_page.section2_paragraph2: Article view statistics are used to analyze article popularity and optimize content recommendations, and will not be used to identify individuals.
privacy_policy_page.section3_paragraph1: We do not sell, trade, or rent your personally identifiable information to third parties. We may share information with trusted third-party service providers who assist us in operating our website, conducting our business, or providing services to you, provided that these parties agree to keep this information confidential.
privacy_policy_page.section3_paragraph2: We may also disclose your information when required by law or to protect our rights, property, or safety.
privacy_policy_page.section4_paragraph1: We adopt appropriate data collection, storage, and processing practices and security measures to protect against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction of your personal information, username, password, transaction information, and data stored on our website.
privacy_policy_page.section5_paragraph1: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information held by us. If you wish to exercise these rights, please contact us using the contact information provided at the end of this policy.
privacy_policy_page.section6_paragraph1: We reserve the right to update this Privacy Policy at any time. When we do, we will revise the updated date at the top of this page. We encourage users to frequently check this page for any changes to stay informed about how we are helping to protect the personal information we collect. You acknowledge and agree that it is your responsibility to review this Privacy Policy periodically and become aware of modifications.
privacy_policy_page.section7_paragraph1: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at:

terms_of_service_page.title: Terms of Service
terms_of_service_page.section1_paragraph1: By accessing and using this blog platform, you agree to comply with these Terms of Service and all applicable laws and regulations. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use this platform.
terms_of_service_page.section2_paragraph1: You may need to register an account to access certain features of this platform. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account information and for all activities that occur under your account.
terms_of_service_page.section2_paragraph2: You agree to provide true, accurate, current, and complete personal information when registering.
terms_of_service_page.section3_paragraph1: You agree to comply with all applicable laws and regulations when using this platform, and not to engage in any of the following activities:
terms_of_service_page.section3_list_item1: Post, transmit, or otherwise make available any content that is unlawful, harmful, threatening, abusive, harassing, defamatory, obscene, invasive of another's privacy, or racially, ethnically, or otherwise objectionable;
terms_of_service_page.section3_list_item2: Impersonate any person or entity, or falsely state or otherwise misrepresent your affiliation with a person or entity;
terms_of_service_page.section3_list_item3: Upload, post, email, transmit, or otherwise make available any unauthorized advertising, promotional materials, junk mail, spam, chain letters, pyramid schemes, or any other form of solicitation;
terms_of_service_page.section3_list_item4: Upload, post, email, transmit, or otherwise make available any content that contains viruses or any other computer code, files, or programs designed to interrupt, destroy, or limit the functionality of any computer software or hardware or telecommunications equipment;
terms_of_service_page.section3_list_item5: Interfere with or disrupt the platform or servers or networks connected to the platform.
terms_of_service_page.section4_paragraph1: All content on this platform, including but not limited to text, graphics, logos, images, audio clips, video clips, data compilations, and software, is the property of this platform or its content suppliers and is protected by copyright law.
terms_of_service_page.section5_paragraph1: This platform is provided on an "as is" and "as available" basis. We make no express or implied warranties, including but not limited to implied warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, and non-infringement.
terms_of_service_page.section6_paragraph1: In no event shall we be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages arising out of or in connection with the use or inability to use this platform, even if we have been advised of the possibility of such damages.
terms_of_service_page.section7_paragraph1: We reserve the right to modify these Terms of Service at any time. All modifications will be effective immediately upon posting to this platform. Your continued use of this platform signifies your acceptance of these modifications.
